name: @deskpro-apps/space
title: Space
description: View your Jetbrains Space issues from Deskpro and link them to tickets you are working on

space_url.title: Space Instance URL
space_url.description: Enter the URL of your Space instance, or "https://<my_company>.jetbrains.space"

add_comment_when_linking.title: Leave a comment on the issue in Space when it is linked to a ticket in Deskpro

default_comment_on_ticket_reply.title: Ticket reply as comment
default_comment_on_ticket_reply.description: Enable option to add Deskpro replies as task comments when a Space issue is linked to a Deskpro ticket

default_comment_on_ticket_note.title: Ticket note as comment
default_comment_on_ticket_note.description: Enable option to add Deskpro notes as task comments when a Space issue is linked to a Deskpro ticket

add_deskpro_tag.title: Add "Deskpro" tag when creating or linking Issue
add_deskpro_tag.description: Automatically adding a tag to indicate in Space that the issue is currently linked to a Deskpro ticket
